data.description: Business Credit card gives business owners access to a credit card facility, plus the option of having more than one card to cover monthly fuel, accommodation and other business expenses.
data.name: Unsecured Business Visa Credit Card

fees.name: Emergency Card Fee- Outside Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a replacement card is requested to be delivered within 5 days

fees.name: Emergency card replacement fee- within Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a replacement card is requested to be delivered within 5 days

fees.name: Overseas currency conversion fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee is calculated on the Australian dollar amount of the transaction

fees.name: Annual fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charge per card

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Cash Advance Fee applies whenever one of the following transactions are performed; Cash withdrawal, cheque withdrawal, periodic payment, direct debit, manual transfer or debit transfer counter transactions at a Heritage Branch; ATM/EFTPOS cash withdrawal or transfer within Australia or overseas*; Cash withdrawal over the counter at another financial institution (domestically or overseas*); Heritage Access Line Transfer; Heritage Online transfer (including payments made by Mobile Banking and New Payments Platform transfers) and withdrawals through Bank@Post (including purchase withdrawals with a cash out component). Other fees may also be applicable for certain cash advance transactions.
fees.additionalValue: 2% of the withdrawal amount (minimum fee of $2.50). (Other fees may also be applicable for certain cash advance transactions). Transactions performed in a currency other than Australian Dollar (AUD) also have Overseas Currency Conversion Fee charged. Withdrawal transactions performed on your Credit Card account through a Bank@Post agency will also include a Bank@Post Cash Withdrawal Fee.

fees.name: Overseas ATM or counter withdrawals (Visa)
fees.additionalInfo: Overseas currency conversion fee is added to base fee

fees.name: Replacement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a replacement card is requested. In each successive 12 month period

fees.name: Statement replacement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a copy of a previous statement is requested

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a direct debit authorised to be made from or to your account is dishonoured

fees.name: Document/Record Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever we provide a copy of a document relating to your card account at your request

fees.name: Manual Transfer Fee- Heritage account
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever we manually transfer funds from your card account.

fees.name: Manual Transfer Fee-External Payee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever we manually transfer funds from your card account.

fees.name: Sweep Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever you place a sweep on your card account to allow funds to be drawn from it and transferred to another Heritage account to meet drawings on that other account.

fees.name: Periodic Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each periodic payment from your card account

fees.name: Interest recalculation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever you ask us to recalculate interest on your card account

fees.name: Default fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a payment remains outstanding after its due date

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged per dat on the date of any debit, other than for fees and charges or interest, to your facility account which causes an overdrawing or further overdrawing.
fees.additionalValue: If the overdrawn amount is at least $15.00 but no more than $40- the fee is $10. If the overdrawn amount is more than $40.00 the fee is $20.00

fees.name: SMS Banking- SMS Alerts
fees.additionalInfo: If an SMS alert is delivered by SMS to your mobile phone

fees.name: Additional Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For the second and each subsequent statement issued during a month, or when a statement is issued on your facility account at your request at any time before the next statement issuing date.

fees.name: Transaction Listing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a transaction listing between two given dates is issued on your facility account

fees.name: Cash and Coin Handling Fee (Deposit)
fees.additionalInfo: If a cash deposit is made to your facility account at a heritage branch or mini-branch of coins which have not been correctly bagged and counted

fees.name: Cash and Coin handling fee (Withdrawals)
fees.additionalInfo: If a cash withdrawal of over $2000 is made from your facility account

fees.name: Heritage on-line business internet banking payroll and creditor batch payments
fees.additionalValue: plus GST per payment in a batch

fees.name: Heritage on-line business internet banking account recconciliation
Heritage on-line business internet banking security token fee
fees.additionalValue: per token each 3 years (including placement tokens)

constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum limit per individual card of 500.00

features.additionalInfo: Bank@Post facility available.  Minimum deposit of $20, maximum deposit of $3,000, minimum withdrawal of $20, maximum withdrawal of $1,000.
Cancel or place your card on hold or Block online, international, in-store or all card payments in our Mobile Banking App
features.additionalValue: Internet, Mobile and Phone banking available

features.additionalInfo: periodic payments and direct debit available

features.additionalValue: Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay, Apple Pay

features.additionalInfo: If Purchase Transactions made on your account may be eligible for an interest free period, then to be eligible for that interest free period you must pay your Closing Balance as shown on your most recent statement in full by the applicable Due Date. If you do not pay your Closing Balance in full by the applicable Due Date, then your outstanding balance of Purchase Transactions shown on the most recent statement will attract interest as per Section 8. Interest. of the Guide to Heritage Credit Card Products.

features.additionalValue: Heritage Credits is Heritage's loyalty program

features.additionalInfo: Business Credit Cards can be issued to business owners and their employees to pay for monthly fuel, accommodation and other business expenses
Allows personal and business expenses to be kept separate
Convenience to take care of business expenses without having to carry cheques and petty cash
Individual monthly spend limits are set by the business owner
Multiple credit cards are issued under one overall approved limit, but each card has an individual spend limit
Minimum repayment based on percentage of outstanding balance is 3% or $30.00 whichever is the greater, plus overlimit or past due amounts.
features.additionalValue: Monthly repayment at 3% of balance or $30, whichever is greater

features.additionalInfo: 24/7  Visa Global Customer Assistance Service -  access to emergency cash disbursement worldwide. Cash disbursement must be within the available credit limit of your card. (Fees and limits may apply).

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Interest rates are on a per annum basis.
Interest rates are on a per annum basis.
